::Kluster::

Kluster nods. "Yes, I understand. A cease fire includes both sides, 
but I think the Alliance will honor their word."

Kluster smiles chuckles. "As for trusting a newbie, I trust fairly 
easily, one of my faults, but trust is part of being a Maximal."



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "SOULSTICE" <thecode@p...> wrote:
> Tarantopulous: You talk kindly. You seem to have trust in a newbie, 
since
> you talk as you do. I shall cease my fire, but only for one thing. 
If the
> Alliance quits firing. Because if they fire at me, I will be forced 
to fire
> back. But other than that. You have my word I won't fire. It angers 
me to
> say so. But the Alliance must leave, right away, I cannot look at 
them in
> peace. If they don't leave, then they are intruding. You do 
understand,
> right?...
